function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Scarcity of data sharing during the COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Impairs collaborative research and slows down progress in understanding and combating the pandemic","Mitigation":"Establish clear data sharing protocols and provide resources to support data sharing efforts","Technologies":"Secure data sharing platforms and standardized data formats","People":"Researchers, healthcare organizations, and data custodians","Owner":"Research institutions, funding agencies, and regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Legal frameworks for international research creating challenges in synthesising data assets","Impact":"Limits the ability to effectively integrate and analyze data from different sources, hindering global research efforts","Mitigation":"Develop a standardized international data governance framework and facilitate cross-border data sharing agreements","Technologies":"Blockchain technology for secure and transparent data exchange","People":"International research organizations, legal experts, and data governance professionals","Owner":"International research organizations, legal entities, and policy makers"},{"Description":"Sociopolitical barriers to data sharing within and between institutions","Impact":"Undermines collaborative data sharing efforts and hinders the advancement of research due to political and institutional obstacles","Mitigation":"Raise awareness, advocate for policy changes, and develop incentive structures for data sharing","Technologies":"Data anonymization and encryption tools to address privacy concerns","People":"Research institutions, government bodies, and advocacy groups","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies, and policy makers"}]}
